name: How do I customise my Help Centre?
title: How do I customise my Help Centre?
body:
You can modify the look and feel of your Help Centre by changing colours and fonts. See Branding your Help Centre to learn how.

You can also change the design of your Help Centre. If you're comfortable working with page code, you can dig in to the site's HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to customise your theme. To get started, see Customising the Help Centre.
